casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rudolph COLES, Jr. 417PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 28, 2019 Michele A. Goldman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Coles, Rudolph (Jr.)

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 27th of June 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of June 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 14th day of August 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
